amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the report by the Secretary of the Treasury to include an economic forecast of the negative consequences of failing to raise the debt limit, including costs associated with public health and safety.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 114-420 to require the Treasury Secretary's report to also include an economic forecast of the negative consequences of failing to raise the debt limit, including costs associated with public health and safety.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kelly (IL) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 234 (Roll no. 71).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kelly (IL) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 234 (Roll no. 71).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Kelly (IL).
